text: Maga jara he tumace mhanane manata nasatila tara tumhi visvasa kara ki he kevala apalya iccha akanksance anusarana karita aheta. Ani tya manasapeksa adhika margabhrasta kona ahe, jo apalya iccha akanksammage dhavata asela, allahacya margadarsanavina? Khatrine allaha atyacari lokanna kadapi marga dakhavita nahi
